2 of the shots hit him and he goes down. part of his right side is damaged and so is his right leg
he then uses enegon knunchucks.
--- Rudra656@... wrote:
> ::Dragoon::
>        He drops back so as to have room to maneuver.  He spots the missiles 
> incoming and decides to try something new.  He uses the energy he can emit to 
> form a type of energy shield.  The first missile hits the shield and destroys 
> it.  "Oh crap.  It had to be energy drain..."  The second missile hits him in 
> the chest and sends him to the floor.  He hauls himself back to his feet and 
> looks at Pika-Hawk.  "Ouch."  He fires four more shots at Pika-Hawk.
> 


=====
cybers will rule
